lines.name: Doryani's Machinarium

explicitModifiers.text: (20-50)% increased Experience gain
Found Items have 10% chance to drop Corrupted in Area
Unique Boss is augmented by Player choices

lines.flavourText: We are ever the makers of our own undoing.

explicitModifiers.text: (20-50)% increased Experience gain

lines.flavourText: We are ever the makers of our own undoing.

lines.name: Cortex
lines.flavourText:
Though my life is gone, my purpose is not.
My will remains, emboldened and empowered
by the righteousness of my cause.

lines.name: Replica Cortex
lines.flavourText:
"Did nobody think to report that we had acquired some sort of free-floating
Memory? Cease testing and lock this away immediately!" 
- Administrator Qotra

lines.name: Augmented Distant Memory
lines.flavourText:
What had seemed sacred and infallible
so quickly became flawed out of necessity.
Created from compromises. Vulnerable to mortal whims.

lines.name: Twisted Distant Memory
lines.flavourText:
Without our strict rule, man's destructive side would take hold.
Our beautiful public spaces, our services for the ill and the needy,
all of it would crumble.

lines.name: Rewritten Distant Memory
lines.flavourText:
It was in my oath that I found peace.
In echoing marble halls I found my voice.
Before the congregation I found purpose.

lines.name: Altered Distant Memory
lines.flavourText:
The winters of my youth were cold and harsh.
We had nothing, yet to my mother's credit, I wanted for so little.

lines.name: The Vinktar Square

explicitModifiers.text: 20% more Monster Life
Monsters cannot be Shocked
20% increased Monster Damage
+35% Monster Lightning Resistance
Monsters deal 35% extra Physical Damage as Lightning

lines.flavourText:
To the east, 
it cannot be seen.
To the west, 
it cannot be touched.
To the south, 
it cannot be remembered.
And to the north, 
it cannot be contained.

lines.name: Infused Beachhead
lines.flavourText:
<<HBGAa>><<HBG01>><<HBGAf>><<HBG02>><<HBGAm>><<HBG03>><<HBGAo>>

lines.name: The Coward's Trial

explicitModifiers.text: Contains waves of Monsters
Contains additional waves of Undead Monsters
Area contains additional waves of Ghosts
Area contains additional waves of Oriathan Zombies
Area contains additional waves of Phantasms
Area contains additional waves of Raging Spirits
Area contains additional waves of Bone Rhoas
Area contains additional waves of Ravager Maws
Area contains additional waves of Zombies

lines.flavourText:
For his sins he was hunted in his sleep,
judgement wrought of twisted nightmare.
The Coward bound his dreams to stone, awaiting
another to walk the path of true atonement.

lines.flavourText:
"Suppression troop two, the 'Martyrs for Science,' were able to seal
the portals before Outpost Four was overrun. Only three men survived."

lines.name: The Putrid Cloister

explicitModifiers.text: Players are Cursed with Vulnerability
Players are Cursed with Flammability
Players are Cursed with Frostbite
Players are Cursed with Conductivity
Players are Cursed with Despair
Unique Boss drops divination cards

lines.flavourText:
Please take out your blades,
your whips, and your spikes.
Class is now in session.

lines.name: Hallowed Ground

explicitModifiers.text: Unique Boss drops 3 additional Maps
Unique Boss gives 2000% increased Experience
0.5 Flask Charges recovered every 3 seconds
+(-2-2) to Monster Level of Area

lines.flavourText:
Some dead have long envied the living.
When given the chance, they take from us what they can.
So we offer our suffrage.
In return, they give only suffering.

lines.name: Death and Taxes

explicitModifiers.text: Unique Boss deals (30-35)% increased Damage
Unique Boss has (25-30)% increased Attack and Cast Speed
Unique Boss gives 20000% increased Experience
Unique Boss drops (12-20) additional Currency Items

lines.flavourText:
So the raiders danced,
leading their foe ever west,
towards certain death.

lines.name: Vaults of Atziri

explicitModifiers.text: Chests have (2501-3498)% increased Item Rarity
Area contains no monsters
Found Items have (20-40)% chance to drop Corrupted in Area

lines.flavourText:
"Should I depart this mortal coil,
so shall all of my treasures."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Vaults of Atziri

explicitModifiers.text: Chests have (2501-3499)% increased Item Rarity

- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Maelstrm of Chaos

explicitModifiers.text: Area has patches of Chilled Ground
Monsters deal 50% extra Physical Damage as Lightning
Monsters are Immune to randomly chosen Elemental Ailments or Stun
Monsters' Melee Attacks apply random Hexes on Hit
Monsters Reflect Hexes

lines.flavourText:
Whispers from a world apart
Speak my name beyond the tomb;
Bound within the Maelstrm's heart,
Will they grant me strength or doom?

lines.name: Olmec's Sanctum

explicitModifiers.text: (40-50)% more Monster Life
(30-40)% increased Monster Damage
Final Boss drops higher Level Items

lines.flavourText:
They flew, and leapt, and clambered over,
They crawled, and swam, and slithered under.
Still its ancient secrets await unclaimed
And of this hidden temple, only legends remain.

lines.name: Oba's Cursed Trove

explicitModifiers.text: Area has patches of desecrated ground
(40-50)% more Monster Life
(30-40)% increased Monster Damage
Area becomes fatal after some time

lines.flavourText:
"Here the soil is more deadly than any swing of the axe."
- Oba of the Karui, Conqueror of Corruption.

lines.flavourText:
Curious, she shook it then,
And tiny screams emerged.
Curiouser, she shook again,
And an eerie silence purred.

lines.name: Pillars of Arun

explicitModifiers.text: (60-100)% increased Experience gain
Area contains unbridged gaps to cross
Monsters have 50% chance to Avoid Ailments
(20-25)% increased Monster Movement Speed
(20-25)% increased Monster Attack Speed
(20-25)% increased Monster Cast Speed
Players have 200% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate for Movement Skills

lines.flavourText: Man creates where nature cannot.

lines.name: Hall of Grandmasters

explicitModifiers.text:
Contains the Immortalised Grandmasters
PvP damage scaling in effect

lines.flavourText:
The grandest and greatest ever to fight,
Divine the champions stand tall.
But match their power, best their might,
And even the immortal may fall.

lines.name: Maelstrm of Chaos

explicitModifiers.text: Area has patches of Chilled Ground
Monsters deal 50% extra Physical Damage as Lightning
Monsters are Immune to randomly chosen Elemental Ailments or Stun
Monsters' Melee Attacks apply random Hexes on Hit
Monsters Reflect Hexes

lines.flavourText:
Whispers from a world apart
Speak my name beyond the tomb;
Bound within the Maelstrm's heart,
Will they grant me strength or doom?

lines.name: Olmec's Sanctum

explicitModifiers.text: (40-50)% more Monster Life
(30-40)% increased Monster Damage
Final Boss drops higher Level Items

lines.flavourText:
They flew, and leapt, and clambered over,
They crawled, and swam, and slithered under.
Still its ancient secrets await unclaimed
And of this hidden temple, only legends remain.
